classes.name: textbox--assisted
classes.description: Modifier class for assisted search textbox

classes.name: search
classes.description: Base class defining styles for search component

classes.name: search__advanced-search-notification-badge-dark
classes.description: class to apply border color on notification badge for forced dark theme in lights on mode

classes.name: search__advanced-search-notification-badge
classes.description: class to apply border color on notification badge

classes.name: search__select-container
classes.description:
Class for wrapping around search
dropdown. Useful for setting the width of the search field

classes.name: search--action-append
classes.description: Class to append an action button to the search dropdown field

classes.name: search__action-button
classes.description: Class to apply styles to search action button

classes.name: search__action-button--hide
classes.description: Class to hide search trigger action button

classes.name: search__action-button--assisted
classes.description: Class to enable assisted search functionality

classes.name: search__action-button--submit
classes.description:
Class to enable submit action button 
in the select template

classes.name: search__action-button--advanced-dark
classes.description: class to apply color for forced dark theme in lights on mode for advanced search icon

classes.name: search__action-button--advanced
classes.description: class to apply when advanced search icon is clicked and activated

classes.name: search__action-button--advanced-icon-active
classes.description: class to apply when advanced search icon is clicked and activated for forced dark theme in lights on mode

classes.name: search__icon--right
classes.description: class to apply styles when advanced search is true and close icon needs on right side before advanced setting icon

classes.name: search__icon-divider
classes.description: class to apply vertical divider line between two icons on right side when advanced search is true

description: This is the Sass version of Search. Following example displays search component using css styles only.
name: Search - Styles
